sources.title: Attack from Space
sources.description: Benevolent aliens from the planet Emerald send superhero Starman to protect Earth from invasion by an evil alien race called the Spherions.

sources.title: Attack From Space (1965) STARMAN
sources.description:
Stars: Ken Utsui, Utako Mitsuya, Sachihiro Ohsawa 
 Directors: Koreyoshi Akasaka, Teruo Ishii

 Benevolent aliens from the planet Emerald send superhero Starman to protect Earth from invasion by an evil alien race called the Spherions. When Starman arrives on Earth, he discovers a conspiracy involving Earth's top scientists, and he must root out the traitors and also stop the impending alien invasion.

sources.title: Attack From Space

sources.title: Attack From Space (1965, Action) Ken Utsui, Sachihiro Ohsawa, Junko Ikeuchi | Film
sources.description:
A cosmic clash of heroes and aliens!
Benevolent aliens from the planet Emerald send superhero Starman to protect Earth from invasion by an evil alien race called the Spherions. When Starman arrives on Earth, he discovers a conspiracy involving Earth's top scientists, and he must root out the traitors and also stop the impending alien invasion.

Original title: Attack From Space (1965) AKA:  Super Giant Vs the Satellites / Attack from Outer Space

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/1TU5YNrM-Ng 


This film is subtitled in many languages.

Directors: Koreyoshi Akasaka, Teruo Ishii, Akira Mitsuwa
Writers: Ichirô Miyagawa
Cast: Ken Utsui, Sachihiro Ohsawa, Junko Ikeuchi
Genres: Action, Sci-Fi
CCC Movie review: https://boxd.it/6kaA9V


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:04 Invasion threat from advanced alien civilization prompts creation of a powerful robot to protect Earth.
18:29 Invasion from outer space threatens Earth as a scientist's plans are stolen, leading to a global emergency.
23:15 Interstellar battle unfolds as resistance fights for freedom against an impending threat.
37:44 A space station faces a threat from alien forces, leading to a race against time to launch a counterattack.
53:05 Space station destruction mission completed with sacrifice and rescue
1:15:12 Farewells and goodbyes in a space-themed movie scene with a touch of luck.
